content.webTitle: How do drug companies arrive at the names they give their products?

fields.headline: How do drug companies arrive at the names they give their products?
fields.bodyText: How do drug companies arrive at the names they give their drugs? Perindopril, clopidogrel, amitriptyline – not exactly memorable, are they? Peter Hanson, Exeter Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
